attributes.action: Extension for Tier 4 Visa Period for Jan Intakes 2020 Due to COVID Effect
attributes.additional_details:
Due to shut down of Part Time employers there are many of Students facing financial issues to cope up .
We also have pressure of finding Internship Companies to enroll for this year 2020 .
On behalf of over all Mass - International Students heart felt situation we urge for Extension of TIER 4 Visa Period for Jan Intakes to summup the collective time to find jobs and Internships in UK .
attributes.background: We are all aware about the pandemic COVID effect on the citizens of UK and the cause effect to the thousands of International Students have returned back to their Home country while thousands of Students waiting at the Indian Embassy to return Back .

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304442

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
